articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Military Parade
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Military Parade
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 After arriving at the square of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the participants, extending a warm salute to them.
					
					 He congratulated the service personnel of the three services and the Strategic Rocket Forces of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards and students of revolutionary schools on demonstrating the spirit of Songun Korea and tremendous national power through their parade.
					
					 He expressed expectation that the participants in the parade would fulfill their mission as standard bearers and shock brigades in invariably preserving the revolutionary nature of the KPA just like the character of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and fully demonstrating the fighting method of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu holding aloft the red flag of the WPK as its first colors.
					
					 Present at the session were senior party, state and army officials Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Ju Kyu Chang, O Il Jong, Choe Pu Il, Son Chol Ju, Pak Jae Gyong, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Sim Sang Dae and Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Army-People Meeting Vows to Wipe out Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Army-People Rally Vows to Wipe out Lee Myung Bak Group
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city army-people rally was held at Kim Il Sung Square Friday to vow to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group, the sworn enemy, in this land and sky.
					 Attending the rally were senior party, state and army officials, officials of the party, the armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media and working people and youth and students as well as overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries and members of military attaches corps here and foreign guests. 
					
					 The statement for the KPA Supreme Command was read out at the rally.
					
					 The floor was taken by representatives of the KPA officers and men, working class, agricultural workers, youth and students and women.
					
					 Yom Myong Su, an officer of the KPA, said the service persons of the KPA will not pardon the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by setting in motion aged reactionaries as miserable as paupers, gangster-like students and ultra-right conservative media.
					
					 The guy of Lee acting just like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger is a half-wit and as disgusting as a rat, the officer noted.
					
					 Pong Won Ik, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, said that what rat-like Lee has done is nothing but the thrice-cursed crimes as he is no more than a political ignorant who only rummaged in a ditch at the bottom of the River Han and an idiot without an equal in the world.
					
					 Kim Hwa Suk, chairperson of the Sadong District Cooperative Farm Management Committee, noted that from olden times a rat has been considered as a disgusting animal as it lives inside a dirty pile of compost and eats dregs thrown away by people. This description is fit for rat-like Lee Myung Bak of modern brand, the chairperson added.
					
					 Kim Nam Chol, department director of the C.C., the youth league, said that it is disgrace and insult to a human being to wrest an apology from rat-like Myung Bak who is too miserable to be beaten and trampled down to death and the worst underwit as he is unable to properly discern a satellite from a long-range missile. This rat-like Lee group, the arch criminal blocking national unity and poisonous grass, deserves only a stern punishment, he pointed out.
					
					 Jon Song Ae of the Kyonghung Guidance Bureau vowed to more dynamically turn out in a nationwide sacred war to beat to death at an early date the worst political gangsters and the hordes of rabid rats gnawing at everything whenever they open their mouths till none of them is left.
					
					 The participants repeatedly shouted slogans like "Let us shower rat-like Lee Myung Bak group with fire of retaliation!" and "Let us cut off windpipes of rat-like Lee Myung Bak group!"
					
					 Then followed a demonstration.

articles.title: DPRK People Vow to Wipe out S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow to Wipe out S. Korean Regime
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The people of the DPRK are enraged at south Korea's Lee Myung Bak group of traitors that defamed again the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and slandered the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					 Jo Hun Gil, an officer of the Korean People's Army who attended the Pyongyang city army-people rally, expressed his surging anger, saying:
					
					 "We can no longer stand the behaviors of the Lee Myung Bak group of rats. Such group should be beaten to jelly at once."
					
					 He didn't hold his temper to use vulgar words unable to repeat.
					
					 Ham Kyong Guk, head of a workshop at the Pyongyang Steel Factory, told KCNA:
					
					 "Lee Myung Bak is worse than a beast and little different from scum. This rabid dog should be cut to pieces for insult to the dignity of our supreme leadership."
					
					 Pang Sun Im, a citizen living in Sinwon-dong, Pothonggang District, said with knives she bought at a direct sales shop:
					
					 "I have bought these sharpened knives to stab to death the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group. My family is enough to cut this rat and its clan to pieces. It is my desire to dash to the south right now to kill all of those rats."

articles.title: 14th Kimilsungia Festival Closes
articles.content:
14th Kimilsungia Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The 14th Kimilsungia Festival came to a close in Pyongyang. It was opened on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival drew more than 300,000 visitors. It deeply instilled into their mind the truth that that Kim Il Sung is always alive with the flower of the sun into full bloom in the hearts of the Korean people and humankind.
					
					 A closing ceremony was held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, officials concerned, officials of armed forces and power organs, ministries, national institutions and public organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army, working people, school youth and children and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Nasri Gustaman and other foreign guests.
					
					 Certificate of special-class prize went to 36 organizations including the Kim Song Dok-led unit of the Korean People's Army and the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and special prize to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and the Indonesian embassy here.
					
					 At least 40 units received certificates of top prize and more than 50 working people, school youth and children, overseas Koreans, foreigners and Chinese residing in the DPRK received certificates of top prize, special prize of merit and prize of merit.
					
					 Certificates of prize for cultivation technology went to cultivators of the units which distinguished themselves in displaying potted Kimilsungias after cultivating them on a scientific and technological basis.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, made a closing speech.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Condolences to Algerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Condolences to Algerian President
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on April 14 sent a message of condolence to Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika on the death of the first president of the country Ahmed Ben Bella of a long illness.
					 Kim in the message expressed condolences to the president, government and people of Algeria and the bereaved family of the deceased.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, left here for China on Friday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, on April 12.
					 The message said:
					
					  It was with great pleasure that I heard the news of celebrations of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the outstanding founder of your country and great father.
					
					 I know that through your work to achieve peace and prosperity and attain the targets of development you are implementing the far-reaching plans and projects of your country's founder President      Kim Il Sung and the great leader Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Pleased with this, I would like to send you, the government and great people of the DPRK congratulations on my own behalf and on behalf of the government and people of Nigeria. I most heartily wish you satisfactory success in your work. 
					
					 I would like to hope for very pleasant celebrations.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Nepali President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Nepali President
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Nepali President Ram Baran Yadav on April 15.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend my sincere congratulations to Your Excellency on the auspicious day when you were elected first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 Nepal and the DPRK have genuine relations of friendship and cooperation based on mutual trust.
					
					 I am convinced that the very favorable relations between our two countries would grow stronger amidst your concern.
					
					 I wish Your Excellency good health, happiness and success and the people of the DPRK continued progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting from Bangladeshi President Zillur Rahman on April 14.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am very pleased to extend my sincere congratulations and best wishes to you and people of the DPRK on the 100th birth anniversary of the great leader H.E. President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 H.E. Kim Il Sung is alive in the hearts of the people of the DPRK for his great leadership ability and heroic struggle for freedom as well as love for the country and the people.
					
					 The great leader built the DPRK into a powerful country and encourages the Korean people.
					
					 Please accept my best wishes to Your Excellency and the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, on April 15.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend my sincere congratulations and best wishes to Your Excellency as regards your election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 I am convinced that the friendship and close cooperation between Myanmar and the DPRK would continue to develop.
					
					 I extend my highest respects and best wishes for your happiness.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on April 13 received a congratulatory message from S. Batbold, chairman of the Mongolian People's Party.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the Mongolian People's Party and on my own behalf, extend warm heartfelt congratulations to respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the WPK, the state and the army, upon your election as first secretary of the WPK and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the WPK under respected your leadership will create more lots for the progress and prosperity of the country and the happy life of the people.
					
					 I wish respected you good health and the Korean people happiness and prosperity, hoping that the traditional friendly relations between out two parties will grow stronger in the future, too.
					
					 Sincerely yours.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Visits Various Places
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Visits Various Places
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill on Friday.
					 He looked round its production processes, being briefed on the innovations being effected by the workers of the mill in production.
					
					 He also visited the venue of the 14 Kimilsungia Festival, Huichon Power Station No. 2, the Sonhung Foodstuff Factory and other places.
					
					 He met with members of various sub-committees of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Builders of Huichon Power Station Commended
articles.content:
Builders of Huichon Power Station Commended 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Soldiers of the People's Army, builders, officials and designers were commended in recognition of their great contribution to the completion of the Huichon Power Station in the DPRK.
					 Watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung were awarded to 268 persons while the certificates of commendation of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un to 176.

articles.title: Unhasu Orchestra's Performance Goes on at People's Theater
articles.content:
Unhasu Orchestra's Performance Goes on at People's Theater
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Performance "Let Us Not Forget the Pledge Made to the Revolution" given by the Unhasu Orchestra continues at the People's Theater in Pyongyang on its opening.
					 Among the audience were scientists and technicians in Pyongyang on Friday.
					
					 The performance began with the playing of the national anthem. Prelude "Let Us Not Forget the Pledge Made to the Revolution", orchestral music and chorus immortal famous masterpiece "Song of Anti-Japanese War", etc., sang high praises of the revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung and his undying exploits.
					
					 The audience keenly realized that the Korean nation could end the nation's bitter history of distress and enjoy the highest dignity as they were led by the President in such numbers as mixed vocal quartet and chorus "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and female vocal solo and female pangchang "I Know it Now".
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers vividly portraying the Korean people who have led worthwhile and happy life under the care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Children presented vocal quartet "We Are Happy", vocal duet "Rainbow over Mangyongdae", piano and song "Glory to Father Marshal" and chorus "Let Us Become the General's Soldiers", delighting the audience.
					
					  Decorating the stage were chorus "Let Korea Advance", immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Il Sung" which reflected the revolutionary enthusiasm of the army and people to become loyal comrades and comrade-in-arms of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and glorify the DPRK as the country of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever. 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Grand Performance for Celebrating Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung Held
articles.content:
Grand Performance for Celebrating Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung Held
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A grand performance for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung "We Will Live Forever, Holding Leader in High Esteem" has been given at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium every day.
					 The artistes of the DPRK and other countries enthusiastically sang of the greatness and undying feats of the peerlessly great men ardently revered by the progressives of the world.
					
					 The audience broke into loud applause and was overcome with deep emotion whenever the images of the kind-hearted President alive among all people as the sun were projected on the screen amid the playing of songs in praise of him.
					
					 The performers represented the reality in the DPRK which greeted a heyday of prosperity by holding Kim Jong Il as the sun of Songun. They, at the same time, reflected the firm will of all the service personnel and people to demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea before the whole world, true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It was appreciated by officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and school youth and children.

articles.title: Participants of ASFAF Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
articles.content:
Participants of ASFAF Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The participants of the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival (ASFAF) visited the International Friendship Exhibition House Friday.
					 At the house, they paid tribute to the wax replica of President Kim Il Sung in deep reverence for him who made an immortal contribution to global independence and development of human culture and art.
					
					 They went round the gifts presented to Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il by heads of party, state and government of many countries and prominent figures.

articles.title: Center of Taekwon-Do Holy Land Completed
articles.content:
Center of Taekwon-Do Holy Land Completed
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The center of the Taekwon-Do holy land was completed as a monumental edifice in the era of Songun in the picturesque Chongchun Street of Pyongyang.
					 The center covering a total floor space of more than 10 thousand square meters has a building with a gable roof of Korean style. It houses a Taekwon-Do history museum, knowledge dissemination room, training room, international conference room and welfare service facilities. 
					
					 There are more than 8,000 trees, flower bushes and turfs in the area around the building.
					
					 The appearance of the center made it possible to widely disseminate Taekwon-Do associated with resourcefulness and spirit of the Korean nation and contribute to giving full play to the dignity and honor as the homeland of Taekwon-Do.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the center took place on Friday.
					
					 Among those present there were Premier Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Myong Chol, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Jang Ung, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned, builders and Pyongyang citizens.

articles.title: Commemorative Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
Commemorative Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued stamps (a sheetlet and an individual stamp) to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Seen in the upper parts of the stamps are letters "Commemoration of 80th Anniversary of the Korean People's Army", "Juche 21 (1932)-Juche 101 (2012)" and "April 25."
					
					 The sheetlet portrays smiling President Kim Il Sung in his Generalissimo's uniform.
					
					 Depicted on the individual stamp are Mt. Paektu symbolic of the glorious tradition of the KPA and the flags of the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army, the supreme commander and the DPRK.

articles.title: School Youth and Children's Festival for Loyalty Closes
articles.content:
School Youth and Children's Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The 18th National Festival of School Youth and Children for Loyalty was closed with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall on Friday. It was opened on February 14. 
					 The festival demonstrated the fixed faith and great enthusiasm of school youth and children to glorify the revolutionary exploits performed by the peerlessly great persons for all ages and greet this year as one of proud victory when an era of prosperity is unfolding.
					
					 It was divided into political, economic, art and sports festivals held by organizations of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at all levels. Pyongyang came first in group standings at the festival.
					
					 Commendations of the C.C., the youth league, trophy cups, silk banners, etc. were awarded to organizations which proved successful at the festival.

articles.title: Pyongyang Declaration Inspires World's Socialist Movement
articles.content:
Pyongyang Declaration Inspires World's Socialist Movement
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 20th anniversary of the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism".
					 The declaration has served as an inspiring banner for political parties and people throughout the world aspiring after socialism.
					
					 In the early 1990s, socialism collapsed one after another in some countries and the imperialists were advertising the "end" of socialism. On top of that, renegade socialists were claiming that the socialist idea itself was wrong.
					
					 Thereby, many countries desirous of socialism began to harbor doubts about it.
					
					 At that time, representatives of 70 political parties from across the world, including 48 party leaders, met in Pyongyang to sign the Pyongyang Declaration in the name of their parties.
					
					 The declaration was inked by more than 150 political parties until the end of Juche 81 (1992).
					
					 Over the past years, the world's socialist movement has got momentum, inspired by the declaration.
					
					 The advantages of the socialist system in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea inspire the world's progressives with confidence that socialism is truth and science and it will unfailingly emerge victorious.

articles.title: Many State Leaders Moved by Kim Il Sung's Virtues
articles.content:
Many State Leaders Moved by Kim Il Sung's Virtues
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Many heads of state in the world had expressed their profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung, deeply moved by his lofty virtues.
					 Among them was Manuel Pinto Da Costa, president of the Democratic Republic of Sao Tome and Principe.
					
					It was in October Juche 71 (1982) when he came to Pyongyang at the invitation of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Answering questions on knotty problems related to the international political affairs, Kim Il Sung was often directing his eyes to the table clock ahead of him.
					
					 When the table clock stroke 6 in the afternoon, he kindly asked Manuel Pinto Da Costa if it was not the time for him to pray, and said a room was already prepared for his prayer.
					
					 Manuel Pinto Da Costa expressed sincere thanks to Kim Il Sung for deep attention even to his country's customs.
					
					 Back home, he told reporters:
					
					 I took a praying in the room prepared personally by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 During my one-minute prayer, I looked back on the history of great persons. There had been no great man in the world's history, for whom I had respect and admiration.
					
					 But there is a distinguished, great person produced by the 20th century. He is HE Kim Il Sung, president of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: Moldovan Accordionists Acclaimed at Art Festival
articles.content:
Moldovan Accordionists Acclaimed at Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Concertino Accordion Ensemble of Moldova played the Korean song "General on a Galloping White Horse" at the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival in Pyongyang.
					 The instrumental music, interwoven with nimble virtuosity and fascinating sounds, gripped the audience by their hearts from the outset.
					
					 The ensemble had paid big efforts to preparing the performance. After arrival in Pyongyang for the festival, it adopted the said song as its performance piece and practiced it day and night.
					
					 As a result, the piece was finished with success to sing highly of the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The ensemble also presented to the festival famous foreign musical pieces.
					
					 It won gold medals at international accordion concours held in Italy and Poland.
					
					 The head of the ensemble told KCNA that the April Spring Friendship Art Festival is very big in scale and has a long tradition and that it is a stage of friendship involving many musicians.

articles.title: "King of Harmonica" from Malaysia
articles.content:
"King of Harmonica" from Malaysia
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Chong Ah Kow, president of the Malaysia Harmonica Lovers Association (MHLA), drew popularity at the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival held in Pyongyang.
					 A prize winner at the 2nd World Harmonica Concours held in Germany, he has superintended various kinds of art festivals in Malaysia.
					
					 Called "King of Harmonica" in Malaysia, he is now active as the chairman of the Organizing Committee for Southeast Asian Harmonica Festival.
					
					 He gave his performance in honor of President Kim Il Sung at the 10th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, and had a photo session with him.
					
					 At the current festival, Chong Ah Kow played a solo with Malaysian folk songs, by skillfully blowing five harmonicas.
					
					 The playing of "Song of General Kim Il Sung" by the My Harmonica World Music Band headed by him drew big applauds from the audience.
					
					 Chong Ah Kow told KCNA:
					
					 I have brought a harmonica with me as a gift to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is my high honor to have played the song "Nostalgia" composed by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 I hope Kim Jong Un would have a rest even for a while, enjoying the playing of harmonica.
					
					 Chong Ah Kow, who is also the chairman of Malaysia's preparatory committee for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, was awarded DPRK Friendship Medal on this occasion.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (34)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (34)
Kim Jong Il Ushers in Era of Building Thriving Nation
					
					 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly great man who defended socialist Korea from foreign forces' persistent moves to stifle it and laid solid foundations for the nation's prosperity. 
					
					 He worked out a blueprint for a rosy future of the DPRK and wisely led its people's heroic drive to turn it into a prosperous and powerful country. 
					
					 In June Juche 85 (1996) the leader toured the Anbyon Youth Power Station nearing the completion of its construction. Highly appreciating the solider-builders for devotedly working to carry out the supreme commander's order despite hardships and difficulties, he called their spirit the revolutionary solider spirit and urged all the people to follow it. 
					
					 Thus the revolutionary working style and spirit, created by the People's Army, prevailed throughout the country as the torch of the times. This resulted in creation of the Kanggye spirit in Jagang Province and appearance of torches of Songgang and Ranam, bringing a turning phase in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Such signal events were taking place one after another as large-scale land rezoning, completion of Kaechon-Lake Thaesong and Paekma-Cholsan waterways, successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-1 and construction of minor hydraulic power stations and modern production bases across the country.
					
					 Under Kim Jong Il's energetic guidance the DPRK succeeded in the historic nuclear test in Oct. 2006, emerging a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Unrolling the grandiose plan to make 2012 a year of decisive victory in the history of building a thriving nation, he visited the Chollima Steel Complex on Dec. 24, 2008 to kindle the torch of fresh surge.
					
					 Thanks to his patriotic devotion and tireless efforts, the DPRK successfully launched its satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and conducted another underground nuclear test, displaying its tremendous strength.  Also such achievements were made as establishment of Juche-based production systems of iron, fiber and fertilizer, the cherished desire of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A dynamic drive for breaking through the cutting edge of science and technology opened up the era of industrial revolution in the new century, and many modern production bases including Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm were built in different parts of the country.
					
					 When the DPRK was at the turning point of opening the door to prosperity, leader Kim Jong Il passed away in a train on the way of his field guidance.
					
					 Total length of his journey of field guidance for building a thriving country reached to more than 353 600 km.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak Group for Slandering Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak Group for Slandering Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Rat-like Lee Myung Bak and his group again committed a hideous crime of hurting the system and the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 In Internet radio speech on April 16, Lee said that the dismantlement of nuclear program, reform and opening are the way-out for the north, bluffing that the north is trying to "consolidate its social system" with the help of nukes and missiles.
					
					 He also egged wicked conservative media, paid plot-breeding organizations and other riff-raffs on to slander the north, while calling celebrations for the Day of the Sun an "extravagant spree". They even fired at images representing the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group has exposed its true colors as a group of matchless savages who have thrown off human mask.
					
					 The burlesque kicked up by the group of traitors reflects its phobia in the face of the mounting might of the DPRK. This reckless act is aimed to curb the praises of the sun-like great man from mounting worldwide along with the 100 year-history of Juche Korea.
					
					 As live-televised through world media, the celebrations for the Day of the Sun in the DPRK offered great historical occasions by which the sun's Korea of Juche successfully reviewed its glorious 100 year-history and the world was assured of the hundreds of thousands of years of Songun Korea that are firmly guaranteed.
					
					 The 100 year-history of Kim Il Sung's nation is shining as glorious years as the dignity of the country and the nation has been put on the highest level after the end of the bitter history of distress.
					
					 This miraculous event is not an accidental one but an inevitable result brought about by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who are pioneer and leader of the Songun revolution.
					
					 No wonder, through the celebrations the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad enshrined the iron truth that the dignity and the prosperity of the country and the nation are guaranteed only when they are led by an outstanding leader.
					
					 The world progressives have been caught with admiration at the immortal feats of the illustrious commanders of Mt. Paektu and the single-minded unity of Songun Korea which is more powerful than a nuclear weapon, and have voiced full support and solidarity with the just cause of the DPRK.
					
					 It is only the Lee group that spoke ill of the great auspicious event of the world.
					
					 As he has prolonged his dirty days with perfidy and defection being tempted by money, he has not been concerned about the dignity and the future of the nation.
					
					 It is the pledge of the army and people of the DPRK to seek out the rat and retaliate against it.
					
					 The nation will feel relieved when it wages the final war of wiping out such rubbish of history as rat-like Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Lee Myung Bak's Smear Campaign
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Lee Myung Bak's Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A tiny handful of traitors dare stand in the way of the grand march of the nation at a turning point of history where a new century of Juche begins. 
					 The rat-like Lee Myung Bak group set in motion all the ultra-right conservative media to kick off a campaign for desecrating the celebrations of the Day of the Sun in the DPRK. The group even hurled ultra-right reactionaries into such provocations as hurting the system and the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The hideous racket kicked off by the group, timed to coincide with celebrations of the Day of the Sun, is one more intolerable, unprecedented provocation.
					
					 This is an undisguised perfidy and challenge to a new century of the nation and its eternal future.
					
					 The group was hit hard by the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The proud review of the 100-year-long history of Songun Korea dealt a telling blow at the group of traitors steeped in flunkeyism and conservatism to the marrow of their bones as it put a definite end to the history of the nation's distress.
					
					 The confrontation-minded elements, finding themselves in such poor position that they can no longer raise their heads, opted to decry and play down the grand festival of the nation in a bid to save their faces. 
					
					 The above-said hooligans behaved so at a time when all compatriots and the world hailed with great excitement and emotion the above-said celebrations as they demonstrated the bright future of the sun's Korea which would bring a reunified thriving nation and happiness and prosperity under socialism.
					
					 The group was stunned by the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, a striking demonstration of inexhaustible national power and potential. Its frantic smear campaign is no more than a last-ditch effort to tarnish the international prestige of the DPRK and destroy the single-minded unity of its party and people.
					
					 The group, which can never be pardoned for the crimes it has committed against the nation, is working hard to prolong its remaining days by kicking up worst confrontation racket at any cost.
					
					 Running high are the indignation and hatred of the service personnel and people of the DPRK. They are firmly determined to wipe out the hideous provocateurs to the last man so that they may stop hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, staying in this part of the world.
					
					 The group will be forced to pay a dear price for its provocations and will never be able to escape the most miserable fate.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Lee Myung Bak Regime of Stern Punishment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Lee Myung Bak Regime of Stern Punishment 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea hurled elder reactionaries and even student hooligans into Kwanghwamun Square and other parts of Seoul to desecrate the DPRK's grand festival held to mark the Day of the Sun. They did not hesitate to stage such thrice-cursed rowdyism as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a by-lined article in this regard:
					
					 This is absolutely unpardonable as it was a revelation of extremely sordid and grave attempt to do harm to the existence of the DPRK and make a crack in the unbreakable single-minded unity.
					
					 The DPRK repeatedly urged the group of traitors to stop its unethical acts and warned it of a merciless sacred war.
					
					 Defying the DPRK's repeated warnings, the group persisted in its hideous provocations. It went the lengths of desecrating the grand festival held to mark the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The events held to mark the Day of the Sun fully demonstrated the fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche through generations, holding the peerlessly great men in high esteem forever.
					
					 Watching the above-said festival, south Koreans were greatly pleased and excited to see "the appearance of the extraordinary young leader" and shouted "Hurrah!" for reunification through the alliance with the north.
					
					 The arms in the hands of the army and people of the DPRK who regard the dignity of the supreme leadership as dearer than their own lives will take merciless revenge upon the perpetrators of those hideous provocations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Reacting to Imperialists' "Theory of Strength" with Powerful Arms
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Reacting to Imperialists' "Theory of Strength" with Powerful Arms
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A revolutionary army guarantees peace and independence, sovereignty and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It is the imperialists' "theory of strength" and a long-harbored way of thinking that the strong can pressurize any country and, furthermore, put the world under control, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Concession and submission in confrontation with the imperialists advocating the above-said "theory" mean death.
					
					 Any concession makes imperialists more arrogant. They are becoming more outrageous before the weak.
					
					 Independence can never be defended by talking only and the prosperity and development of the country can hardly be achieved through mendicancy.
					
					 An army can provide the surest guarantee for the prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Arms should serve the popular masses in accomplishing their cause of independence, the socialist cause, both in name and reality. The army should properly perform its mission, regarding the idea of the leader as its faith. Only such army can emerge victorious in confrontation with imperialism. This has been proved by the practical experience gained by the DPRK.
					
					 It was the army that took the lead in upholding the Juche idea whenever the Korean revolution faced a stern trial.
					
					 Arms should be countered with arms and the revolution should be guaranteed by them. The validity of this philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea has been clearly proved in the standoff between the DPRK and the U.S. which has become fierce since the 1990s.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime's Hideous Provocations under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime's Hideous Provocations under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea and his group again malignantly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, daring desecrate the events held on the Day of the Sun. This was an intolerable challenge and a hideous provocation to the dignity of the supreme leadership, social system and people of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a by-lined commentary.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 Such reckless behavior of the group of traitors was an expression of extreme hostility towards fellow countrymen and an unconditional denial of the dignified social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK can never pardon such acts of hurting the most sacred and undisputed dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea are unanimous in opposing the country-selling rule of Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party" and it has become an irresistible trend of the present times to call for "judging the government."
					
					 The Lee group is working hard to divert elsewhere the attention of the angry people by escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen but its fate has already been sealed.
					
					 Traitor Lee is now more dead than alive. No matter how loudly he may trumpet, the dignified social system and the unbreakable single-minded unity remain unfazed.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will wipe out the group of traitors to the last man as it dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership which is dearer than their own lives.

articles.title: Corruption of "Saenuri Party" Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Corruption of "Saenuri Party" Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Molestation of Kim Yong Thae of the "Saenuri Party" who was elected as a "National Assemblyman" has been disclosed, sparking off public furor, according to south Korean MBC on April 18.
					 It is said that this guy molested his younger brother's wife when she asked him to help her eke out her living in April 2002.
					
					 This touched off public criticism, making the history of the "Saenuri Party" ridden with sexual assaults become topic of public discussion. Much upset by this, Kim Yong Thae is busy with seeking a way out of the crisis, including his withdrawal from the party.
					
					 The Democratic United Party urged Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" to make an apology to the people as they recommended the immoral guy as a candidate for the NA election.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held an event to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid a floral basket before a full-length painting of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il standing together at the DPRK embassy in Tashkent on April 15, Day of the Sun before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Present there were Sok Myong Son, chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans, Ju Yong Il, chairman of the Elders' Association of Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, and its vice-chairmen, heads of Korean art groups and other Koreans.
					
					 A celebration meeting of Koreans in Uzbekistan was held in Dostobod City on April 13 on the same occasion.
					
					 At the meeting a speaker praised Kim Il Sung as kind-hearted father of the people as he was possessed of matchless wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and exceptionally noble popular traits.
					
					 A performance was given by Korean artistes.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in their respective countries between April 12 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the election of the dear respected Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the Party Central Military Commission and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 They laid floral baskets before full-length paintings of the President standing together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.   
					
					 They included the general secretary and the international secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union who is president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, the chairman and the secretary general of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", the general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist－Leninist) who is minister of Industry, the chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, a member of the Political Bureau 
					
					 of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, Yazov, minister of Defence of the former Soviet Union, and his party and the chairman and members of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) and the secretary of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies.

articles.title: Significant Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Significant Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Different countries posted special write-ups on Internet websites between April 2 and 4 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Posted on Russian website "Mega Mir" was the following article titled "Strength of the DPRK" with photos of Kim Il Sung and the dear respected Kim Jong Un:
					
					 The DPRK is a country not big in its territory and population but it has such tremendous strength that no one dares provoke.
					
					 The traditional single-minded unity provided by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il has been further consolidated by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The noble personality of Kim Jong Un impresses everybody.
					
					 His visit to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army as his first field inspection this year was a very meaningful declaration of his will to carry forward the cause of Songun without an inch of deflection.
					
					 The website of the Peruvian Committee for Solidarity with Peoples carried a photo of Kim Il Sung's birthplace at Mangyongdae with a portrait of smiling President.
					
					 Posted on the website of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship were a photo of Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the KPA and articles titled "Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and the Cause of Songun" and "Guards Division and Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The website of the Communist Party of Argentina conveyed accounts of international celebrations of the Day of the Sun in the DPRK with splendor with an attendance of prominent figures of different countries in the world.

articles.title: Foreign People Laud Kim Il Sung as Great Man Recognized by World Progressives
articles.content:
Foreign People Laud Kim Il Sung as Great Man Recognized by World Progressives
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's undying feats were praised by foreign people at events held on the occasion of the centenary of his birth.
					 Lectures, book and photo exhibitions, film shows and art performances took place in Russia, Indonesia, Uganda, Malaysia, Romania, Pakistan, Dominica and Guinea between March 29 and April 11.
					
					 The first secretary of the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Russians are praising the President as an outstanding strategist, distinguished statesman and experienced state leader.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement noted that the President was the great leader who indicated the way of independence to be followed by the Korean people and the world progressives by founding the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 Mohammad Aslam Malik, secretary general of the Punjab Provincial Committee of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan, noted that the President led the DPRK to successfully carry out the historic task for industrialization in a short span of time and thoroughly adhere to the principle of independence in foreign relations.
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, said that the President was a great man recognized by the world progressives and a man like the sun.
					
					 The secretary general of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle noted that the DPRK is the only country in the world which firmly protects its sovereignty, standing firm in confrontation with the U.S., adding that it is the country blessed with illustrious leaders.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Three Principles of National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia on April 11.
					 The work, published on May 3 and Nov. 3, 1972, deals with the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- and the idea of achieving cooperation between the north and the south of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Polish Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Polish Organization
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Establishing Social Trait of Attaching Importance to Military Affairs" was posted on the website of the League of Polish Communist Youth on April 13.
					 The work was published on Feb. 4, 1992.

articles.title: Iranian Armed Forces Warn Enemies of Military Threat
articles.content:
Iranian Armed Forces Warn Enemies of Military Threat
 Tehran, April 19 (KCNA) -- A high-ranking commander of the Iranian Army warned enemies of their recent military threat.
					 Recalling that the Iranian army is following enemies' moves with vigilance, he said that it is fully ready to cope with any military threat.
					
					 The Iranian armed forces having modern arms and equipment and great military potential will take prompt and overwhelming counter-actions against every possible threat and aggression of the enemies, he added.

articles.title: Electricity Production in Kenya
articles.content:
Electricity Production in Kenya
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kenya is directing its efforts to producing electricity by use of geothermal. 
					 The government announced its plan to build 400MW geothermal plant which will go operational by 2016.
					
					 Its current generating capacity by geothermal amounts to 205 MW.

articles.title: Philippine Exports in Feb. Increase
articles.content:
Philippine Exports in Feb. Increase
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Export receipts in February rose 14.6 percent as compared with the corresponding month last year, according to data issued Thursday by the National Statistics Office.

articles.title: Zimbabwe Mineral Export Earnings Expected to Increase
articles.content:
Zimbabwe Mineral Export Earnings Expected to Increase
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Zimbabwean government on Tuesday said the country's mineral export earnings this year are expected to increase by 19 percent. 
					 The export of platinum, diamonds, etc. is expected to markedly swell.

articles.title: Earthquake Jolts Vanuatu
articles.content:
Earthquake Jolts Vanuatu
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 6.6 on the Richter scale rocked Vanuatu on April 14.
					 The epicenter was 33 km on the bottom of waters off the southeast region.

articles.title: Highway Project in Algeria
articles.content:
Highway Project in Algeria
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Algeria has officially announced the launch of the Blida-Ghardaia section of the country's major North-South Highway project linking Algiers and Guezzam-Ain.
					 The first phase of this strategic project would pass through the provinces of Blida, Medea, Djelfa, Laghouat and Ghardaia.
					
					 This important highway project covers a total of 1,013 km as it is part of the government programme for development by 2030.

articles.title: Brazilian President Stresses Importance of Industry, Science and Professional Education
articles.content:
Brazilian President Stresses Importance of Industry, Science and Professional Education 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Brazil is focusing its efforts on the professional education in an aim to boost the competitiveness of the local industry.
					The government of this country plans to build over 100 technical education institutions of different levels and renovate some 250 schools.
					
					 The government said this on April 13.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en desfile military
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en desfile militar 
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo una fotografia de recuerdo junto con los participantes en el desfile militar en celebracion del centenario del natalicio del gran Lider Generalisimo Kim Il Sung. 
					Al llegar a la plaza del Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un respondio cordialmente a las aclamaciones de los participantes. 
					
					Felicito calidamente a los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas, las fuerzas  de cohetes estrategicos del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los miembros del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y la Guardia Juvenil Roja, y los alumnos de las escuelas revolucionarias, quienes al participar en el desfile militar en celebracion del centenario del natalicio del gran Lider Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, demostraron el impetu de la Corea del Songun y el inagotable poderio estatal.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los participantes en el desfile militar mantendran invariablemente la naturaleza revolucionaria del Ejercito Popular de Corea heredada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y cumpliran la mision de abanderados y brigadas de choque en manifestar sin reservas el modo de lucha del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu que enarbola la bandera roja del PTC como primer estandarte militar. 
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito: Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Ju Kyu Chang, O Il Jong, Choe Pu Il, Son Chol Ju, Pak Jae Gyong, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Sim Sang Dae y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin de militares y ciudadanos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin de militares y ciudadanos de Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Transcurre ahora en la capitalina Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de militares y civiles de Pyongyang para jurar la liquidacion de la horda de Lee Myung Bak, enemigo jurado. 
					La plaza esta repleta de los militares y trabajadores de distintos estratos concentrados con gran indignacion y enemistad hacia la banda de ratones de Lee Myung Bak que como si fuera poco su crimen de traicion cometido durante el gran duelo nacional, volvio a ofender la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Premiados constructores y disenadores de la Central de Huichon
articles.content:
Premiados constructores y disenadores de la Central de Huichon 
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Fueron premiados los militares, los constructores, los funcionarios y los disenadores que hicieron gran aporte a la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon.
					268 recibieron el reloj con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung y 176 obtuvieron el certificado de reconocimiento del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Clausurado 14o Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Clausurado 14o Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia la ceremonia de clausura del 14o Festival de Kimilsungias, iniciado con motivo del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					El presente festival, visitada por mas de 300 mil personas, ha infundido los principios filosoficos de que aunque transcurriera el tiempo el Presidente  Kim Il Sung esta siempre vivo en el corazon del pueblo conreano y la humanidad progresista junto con Kimilsungia, flor del sol, en pleno florecimiento.
					
					En la ceremonia de cierre estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas y el poder, ministerios, organos centrales, y entidades sociales, los militares del EPC, los trabajadores, los jovenes y alumnos y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar. 
					
					Fueron invitados el embajador indonesio en Corea Nasri Gustaman, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Fue otorgado el diploma del premio de lugar especial a 16 entidades, incluso la unidad militar del EPC a que pertenece Kim Song Dok y el Ministerio de Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el diploma del premio especial al Presidium del Comite Central de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de los Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y la embajada de Indonesia en Corea. 
					
					Ademas, mas de 40 unidades recibieron los diplomas del premio mejor y mas de 50 trabajadores, jovenes, ninos escolares, compatriotas residentes en ultramar, extranjeros y chinos residentes en Corea ganaron el diploma del premio mejor, el premio de benemerito especial  y de benemerito. 
					
					Los cultivadores de varias unidades, quienes expusieron las Kimilsungias cultivadas de manera cientifico-tecnica, recibieron el diploma de premio tecnico. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Coreano de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia, Kim Chang Do, pronuncio la palabra de clausura.

articles.title: Inaugurado Centro de Taekwondo, lugar sagrado
articles.content:
Inaugurado Centro de Taekwondo, lugar sagrado
Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 la ceremonia de inauguracion del Centro de Taekwon-do, lugar sagrado construido magnificamente en el capitalino reparto Chongchun como una creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun.
					  El edificio con tejado de cuatro aguas al estilo coreano tiene el area arquitectonica de mas de diez mil metros cuadrados y consta del pabellon de la historia de Taekwon-do, la sala de propaganda de conocimientos, el estadio de entrenamiento, la sala de reunion internacional, la de preestreno y los establecimientos de servicio publico.
					
					  En sus contornos se trasplantaron mas de 8 miles arboles y arbustos floriferos y el cesped.
					
					  El centro de Taekwon-do contribuira a divulgar ampliamente este arte marcial penetrado de la inteligencia y el espiritu de la nacion coreana y exaltar la dignidad y el honor de patria de Taekwon-do.
					
					   En la ceremonia de inauguracion estuvieron presentes el premier Choe Yong Rim, el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Ri Yong Su, el ministro de Deportes Pak Myong Chol, el presidente de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwon-do (ITF en ingles), Jang Ung, el presidente del Comite Coreano de Taekwon-do, Kim Kyong Ho, los funcionarios interesados, los constructores y los trabajadores capitalinos.
